channel.title: Am i supposed to make a client or download it
channel.description: [b] So far I've portfowarded and got the stuff from no-ip.com. Do i need to make a client or download it. I need help!!! I'm on a mac.[/b] Can someone tell me Step by step on how how to make a private server.
